alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Johnson; Lafayette; Pettis; Saline (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 27 at 2:30AM CST until February 27 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Pettis County in central Missouri... Southeastern Carroll County in north central Missouri... Western Saline County in central Missouri... Southeastern Lafayette County in west central Missouri... Northeastern Johnson County in west central Missouri... * Until 300 AM CST. * At 230 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Alma to 6 miles north of Knob Noster, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marshall, Concordia, Sweet Springs, Waverly, Alma, Malta Bend, Blackburn, Wakenda, Emma, Miami, Mount Leonard and Grand Pass. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 57 and 70. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
